title: Provides for testing of newborns for presence of alcohol and/or controlled substance, rehabilitation services for parents and rules of admissibility for such tests
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing drug rehabilitative services to parents of a newborn who tests positive for alcohol and/or controlled substances; to amend the public health law, in relation to providing for testing of newborns for alcohol or controlled substances; and to amend the family court act, in relation to the admissibility of laboratory tests showing usage of a controlled substance and referring certain alcohol and substance abusers to drug treatment court
